title: Is it true that i can get a riot member to play with me on 999 wins?
body: ON 999 WINS wonder i could get a riot member to play with me for 1000?

replies.body: In most cases a Riot employee will play with you. It just depends on their schedule as I imagine they'd be busy. I'm sure if you give it some time a Riot employee will reply to this thread. Good luck!
and.... 9 months and still waiting. They sit there... ever so taunting me with their constant away status :3

It appears the Riot employees are broken again and aren't slacking off their jobs by playing the product of their own work. Send a support ticket and ask about the broken Riot Employee who's not playing LoL and working productively.
1000, then you have a 1/1000 chance to play
